content.text: Rahul plans a road trip from pune to satara. He travels 300kms in 5 hours. He starts at 7 a.m. in the morning at a constant speed of 60kmph and reaches the 60km mark at 8 a.m.. Use the time-distance graph to answer the following :

hint.text:
Observe that the graph is a straight line which rises proportionally.
Speed=\(\frac{Distance}{Time}\)
